ResearchProjectDef.label: Psychic Wave Generator Tier 1
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into the basics of manipulating insects with psychic waves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psychic Wave Generator Tier 2
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improve the performance of the latest tier and develop a way so that the waves can pass through walls!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infestation Wave Creater
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use your gained knowledge to develop a way to center a psychic wave to a point so an infestation will occur!

ResearchProjectDef.label: A strange satellite\n
ResearchProjectDef.description: One evening, your research detected a strange signal at the comps console. After some research it turned out to be satellite in orbit! One you hacked into it, the satellite opened a telnet connection. After some hard work you found out it was a giant psychic wave generator and turned out to do the same thing you were researching all the time. Creating infestations... \n\n Your research quickly programmed a graphical user interface that he calls the "Satellite Terminal" so that every idotic colonist can operate the satellite!

ResearchProjectDef.label: A mysterious blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: While you where searching through the files of the satellite you stumbled on an odd blueprint that seemed to be encrypted. After you finally managed to decrypt it you found a blueprint for a giant psychic wave generator! It seems to be strong enough to affect every insect on the map... even undergrounds...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hack engine controls\n
ResearchProjectDef.description: Your researcher found out that you can hack into the control system of the engines so it always stays in range with your sender! Unfortunately, the satellite has a built-in spam protection so you can only send an attack request every 10 hours...
